name: Spotify playlist to slack
description: Show new playlist entries in a slack channel

SPOTIFY_USERNAME.description: A Spotify username for the user who has the playlist

SPOTIFY_PLAYLIST_USERNAME.description: A Spotify username that the playlists if other than SPOTIFY_USERNAME

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: A Spotify developer client app id

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A Spotify developer client app secret

SPOTIFY_PLAYLIST_IDS.description: A comma sparated list of playlist ids

SPOTIPY_CACHE.description: The result of a spotipy cache run
